name: Hero Universal Microchip Scanner – Reads ISO & Non-ISO Pet Microchips – Bluetooth® Enabled with 15-Minute Display Hold – Backlit LCD Screen, Protective Case & FCC Certified – 7-Inch Handheld Reader
short_description: UNIVERSAL MICROCHIP COMPATIBILITY FOR MULTI-SPECIES SCANNING: Reads all 9, 10, and 15-digit ISO and non-ISO microchips, including FDX-A, FDX-B, and common pet ID formats. Ideal for veterinary clinics, shelters, rescues, breeders, and animal control handling dogs, cats, and other small animals. Provides broad compatibility and reliable scanning with nearly every major pet microchip brand on the market.

BLUETOOTH CONNECTIVITY FOR FAST, ACCURATE DATA TRANSFER: Easily sends scanned chip numbers to Bluetooth-enabled devices within a 25-foot range for quick syncing to computers, tablets, or shelter management software. Reduces manual data entry errors and speeds up check-in and intake processes—perfect for busy clinics or multi-pet facilities.

BACKLIT LCD SCREEN WITH 15-MINUTE DISPLAY HOLD: Features a bright blue backlit LCD screen with bold white text displaying the full chip number on one line for easy reading. The 15-minute display hold gives users ample time to document or record the scan without rushing, making it ideal for high-volume or field settings.

RECHARGEABLE BATTERY WITH AUTO POWER-SAVE MODE: Includes a rechargeable 9V battery and charging unit for long-lasting performance. The auto shut-off function conserves power between uses—great for mobile vets, rescue teams, or animal control officers who need dependable scanning during long sessions.

LIGHTWEIGHT, DURABLE DESIGN WITH PROTECTIVE CASE: This 7-inch handheld pet microchip scanner is compact, ergonomic, and easy to carry. Includes a rugged black protective case to guard against impact or debris during transport. Built for durability and portability in clinic, shelter, and field-use environments.
product_description: Easily identify pets with the Hero Universal Microchip Scanner, a Bluetooth-enabled handheld reader designed for fast and reliable microchip detection. Compatible with both ISO and non-ISO microchips, this universal scanner supports animal identification across multiple chip formats used in dogs, cats, and other small animals. The large backlit LCD screen clearly displays the full microchip number on a single line and holds the information for 15 minutes, allowing you to record data without rushing. Its Bluetooth connectivity instantly transfers chip numbers to nearby devices for seamless digital tracking or recordkeeping. Built for convenience and durability, this 7-inch handheld pet microchip scanner features a comfortable grip, lightweight design, and protective carrying case for safe storage and transport. The FCC-certified construction ensures dependable performance and safety in professional or at-home use. Perfect for veterinarians, shelters, breeders, and pet owners, the Hero Universal Microchip Scanner provides accurate, portable, and reliable pet identification—anytime, anywhere.
